title: After Champ Select Fail to Connect "check firewall..." Reconnect attempts forever...
body:
Hi guys, I'll try to be as clear as possible since i'm french (from new caledonia), and I'm quite confused about how to solve this freakin issue.

Since I started playing LoL in my house, I've been experiencing this (aparently very old) issue : after champ select, the Client closes, like it's supposed to, then the LoL logo pops up, all good so far, but then when the loading screen is supposed to show up, a black screen appears, then after about 1 min, a small window tells me "failed to connect to server, pls check firewall...". the only way to get the game loading, is to click on "cancel", wait for the client to re-appear, then click on the "reconnect" button, and if it's not successful, just repeat this forever... Sometimes I can enter in the game after 2 or 3 tries, but most of the times it's about 10 min of boring struggle (when it works), and it ends up with a 20min penalty for being afk...

I've tried everything i found (flushing dns, going in files and renaming some logitech files, trying to put some manual DNS numbers, repairing, re-installing, restarting the laptop...), but so far, nothing. After doing some more research, I read somewhere that my Internet Service Provider (or my rooter, or something related to my IP, or my DNS or som' like that) could cause the issue I'm facing (the ISP I'm using is a local one so I won't bother you with its name), and so I made a test : I went at my brother's home, where the ISP there isn't the same as the one used at my home. It turns out I can login in every single games over there, everything works perfectly!

So at this point, I know that either my home's rooter, or my home's ISP is in cause here. Unfortunately, my knowledge regarding either of those is quite limited, so I was wondering what could be the next step, in order to be able to play without having to go at my brother's house. Should I call my ISP? And if so, what should I ask?

I know this issue is a pretty old one, and that it have been discussed several times already, but I'm quite desperate, and I did check the old topics before... It is because I can't find what to do, and play the game I like, that I decided to make one of my own.

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and I'd really appreciate some advice!
Regards

Sam

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [manually adding exceptions for league in your firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) for me, let me know if this helps.

Hi ty for your reply :)

I tried this already, and nothing changed, i still had to reconnect until the loading screen pops up (eventually, or just wait for the game to finish and be considered afk xd ). I first disabled completely my firewall, then i added LoL in the list... nothing seemed to work.
That's odd, you mentioned you believe it might be an issue with your ISP, Have you tried contacting them?
